product.title: The Rescuers Down Under | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Rescuers Down Under

Young readers will be enthralled by this tale of rescue, teamwork, and wildlife preservation, intertwined with a classic good versus evil message. The story unfolds when Cody, a boy from Mugwomp Flats, responds to a distress call from Marahute, a Golden Eagle caught in a poacher’s trap. When a villainous animal poacher lures Cody to Marahute’s nest, the Rescue Aid Society sends top agents Bianca and Bernard to stop McLeach and save Cody and Marahute. Behind the fast, high-energy pace of the story are valuable lessons about nature conservation and loyalty.

Tie-in Activity: Engage your child in a discussion regarding endangered animals. Ask her to list what animals need to in order to survive, and help her list the sources of shelter, water, and food for backyard animals in your own neighborhood.
